title: [GAMEPLAY]   Pirate Ryze Joke, very glitchy
body:
Ryze drinking his ale is just really messed up. For one the animation barely plays when I intend it too. All of his other emotes work fine, he'll stop mid run to do it, or I can spam the animation like normal etc. But for this, hitting a hotkey not only doesn't stop him, but it also forces me to wait standing still for about 3-5 whole seconds before the animation will play.
If while moving I type in /joke then it works fine, but I still can't repeatedly type quickly to have him use the animation repeatedly. I don't THINK this is intentional, because every other emote in the game allows you to do this.
Also Ryze's ale flashes in and out of existence for no reason at random. Also when you face upwards, (I've noticed it's much worse when looking up and right) his bottle becomes completely transparent.
All of these issues occur everytime, in multiple games.

replies.body: Heyo! Thanks for the report! I caught up with Champion Update, and it looks like they're aware of the issue. ^-^ We'll get him (eye)patched up.

Thanks pirate ryze looks really cool updated from his spells to his visuals. Usually I get scared when they do vgus because often the skin's quality drops. Feels like a waste of RP at that point when a cool skin gets rekt. Pirate ryze transitioned well though
